text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Fear not - We need no vaccine. 
We already have a Treatment for COVID-19
Five (5) days treatment:
1 - Hydroxychloroquine 200 mg 1 pill twice a day
2 - Azithromycin 500 mg 1 pill a day
3 - Zinc sulfate 220 mg 1 pill a day
Mr President the wind is at your back, reopen the economy!!
